frontmatter.description: Write smart contracts in your choice of syntax. Code will compile to Michelson, the smart contract language of the Tezos blockchain.

frontmatter.description: Use a library to integrate Tezos with your application.

ConseilPy - Python toolkit for Conseil indexer and API
TezosKit - Swift SDK for iOS, macOS, and iPadOS
Magic - passwordless wallet connector for apps

frontmatter.title: Online Training Courses and Educational Resources

resources.title: Sol2Ligo handbook
resources.description: Learn Ligo and write Tezos smart contracts with the interactive tool. Convert your Solidity contracts to Ligo easily.

resources.title: Blockmatics SmartPy Developer Course
resources.description: Blockmatics’ SmartPy Developer Course teaches the basics of SmartPy and the SmartPy IDE.

resources.title: Cryptoverse Wars (SmartPy)
resources.description: Cryptoverse Wars is a fun interactive code school developed by BUIDL Labs that teaches developers how to write smart contracts in SmartPy.

resources.title: Tezos Academy (LIGO)
resources.description: Tezos Academy is a fun interactive tutorial developed by OCTO Technology on how to code  smart contracts in LIGO.

resources.title: Tezos Training at Nomadic Labs
resources.description: After running successfully through all the steps of this training session, you will be able to run a Tezos node (test network/sandboxed), use the Michelson emacs mode, and compile pieces of code in both LIGO and SmartPy.

resources.title: TQ Digital Assets Portal
resources.description: This documentation aims to help developers streamline the implementation, integration, and use of digital assets on Tezos.

resources.title: Getting Started with LIGO
resources.description: These tutorials by Claude Barde walk-through how to create smart contracts on the Tezos blockchain using the LIGO language.

resources.title: Cryptonomic Developer Portal
resources.description: Cryptonomic’s tech stack makes it easy to develop and deploy Tezos applications.

resources.title: An Introduction to Michelson
resources.description: These tutorials by Claude Barde walk-through how to use the Michelson programming language and write smart contracts on Tezos.

resources.title: CoinList-Tezos Hackathon Workshops
resources.description: Online workshops from the development teams of tools such as Truffle, Magic, SmartPy, LIGO, and more.

resources.title: Tezos Developer Documentation
resources.description: A complete Tezos documentation resource for developers.

resources.title: TezEdge Tezos documentation
resources.description: A documentation resource by the TezEdge team.

resources.title: TQ Tezos Wiki
resources.description: A Tezos wiki by the TQ Tezos team. Learn about Tezos basics, proof-of-stake in Tezos, governance, smart contracts, and more.

resources.title: Nomadic Labs Research
resources.description: Research and development on distributed, decentralized, and formally verified software.

frontmatter.title: Explore the Blockchain
frontmatter.description: Use a block explorer to analyze the Tezos blockchain.
